channel.title: Official Noble Rework
channel.description:
# Proposed Noble Rework:
> # [color=steblue]Noble[/color] > * Keeps Day abilities. > * Snoop removed > * New Night Ability with some cool name (Gossip?) - You will receive the feedback of any ability used on your target tonight. Unlimited uses. > So if the Sheriff investigates an Unseen member you will see "_Target_ is a member of the Unseen!" You won't know who the Sheriff is. Wouldn't see conversion or attack messages. > * Maid Spy will now spy on everyone in the castle. 3 uses.
> # [color=purple]Aristocrat[/color] > * Keeps Day abilities. > * Snoop removed > * New Night Ability Frame - Just like the Scorned's it make a target appear evil to investigation abilities. Unlimited uses. > * Maid Spy will now spy on everyone in the castle. 3 uses.
> # [color=red]Apostle[/color] > * Can spawn with Cult Leader at the start > * Keeps Day abilities. > * Snoop removed > * New Night Ability Mind Warp - Works just like the Illusionist's. 4 uses. > * Cult Spy will now spy on everyone in the castle. 1 use.
If anyone says the Noble should be pure vote or whisper manipulation, I am going to take all your gold away. People don't find those fun.

item.title: Official Noble Rework
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Let me explain it to you in more detail. The vote will not show up, neither through message or the actual vote, for any members other than the Noble/Apostle/Aristocrat. Behind the scenes it will stay in play however. This can result in three situations of relevance: 1) Noone will be voted up for trial, meaning nothing will happen. 2) The person that has an extra noble forced vote on him is being put up for trial, meaning the extra noble vote will count for being put on trial now. This would only occur if x - 1, votes for being put on trial are already cast, meaning a trial will always be required to test noble voting now. x being the number required to vote someone up. 3) Someone else than the person who has an extra noble forced vote on him is being put up for trial and this someone else is the target of the “vote” of the one who is being pressured, so not whoever the pressure dictates, but the player being pressured. This person would now required x + 1 votes to be put onto trial, because the person being pressured, does not count towards the votes being required.

It is a bit convoluted to explain, but I hope you get the idea. Just be creative and it is really not that difficult to make noble voting silent. It can still be tested in some sense, but it will always require a trial now and with limited trials, that is a severe restriction and in practical ToL games, I wouldn’t see this incarnation being tested anymore, because it is really hard to see and very impractical.
